item.title: Hi,I just tried own-id.com, but didn't get ver...
item.description:
Hi,
I just tried own-id.com, but didn't get very far. I added the CNAME but was prompted to 'enter the OpenId you got from your provider.' I have no clue what to do from here, so I tried with my email address giving a 1537 fatal transport error, then â€¦
